definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together

sentences.english: Though marriage makes man and wife one flesh, it leaves them still two fools.
sentences.chinese: 虽则结婚使夫妻合为一体，但仍旧还不过是蠢人两个。

sentences.english: The goal of spiritual discipline is the rediscovery of his true identity with the divine Reality.
sentences.chinese: 灵性训练的主旨是让他重新发现自己与神性合为一体。

sentences.english: Working USB flash drive was integrated into a rubber chicken.
sentences.chinese: 工作用的优盘和橡胶鸡合为一体。

sentences.english: It is a book of English phonetics , grammar and usage all in one.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本英语语音，语法和习惯用法合为一体的著作。

definition: to conform to/to fit with/to be compatible with
a tripartite balance/compromise between three rivals
to exist side by side/to exist simultaneously

four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
to converge/to flow together/fig. to act alike/to evolve together
to establish as separate entities/to divide (a company etc) into independent entities/discrete/separate/separation (of powers etc)
